mapper.update: update url set url_status = 1 where down_system_site_id = #{id} and url_status = 2 and date_add(last_cache_time,interval #{urlCacheTimeout} minute) < current_timestamp

update url set url_status = 1 where down_system_site_id = #{id} and url_status = 3 and last_page_Result != 1 and last_success_time is null and totoal_crawl_count < {urlMaxCrawlCount} and date_add(last_crawl_time,interval #{urlFailedRetryTimeout} minute) < current_timestamp
update url set url_status = 1 where down_system_site_id = #{id} and url_status = 3 and last_page_Result = 1 and date_add(last_success_time,interval #{urlResetTimeout} minute) < current_timestamp
